title: Dynamic Competency Development Simulation in Multi-Organizational Service Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational behavior, foundational knowledge management, and service operation processes
context.additional_context: Experiencing competency development through role-playing in virtual scenarios of multicultural service organizations with high/low cultural distance

learning_goals: Students can analyze and explain the influence of structural/relational social capital (based on high/low cultural distance) on exploratory/exploitative knowledge learning in VR simulations.
Students can systematically evaluate dynamic capability development strategies across diverse organizational environments using structural equation modeling.
Through simulation-based case studies, students can strategically select and apply exploratory/exploitative knowledge learning types tailored to organizational characteristics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
